actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Requiring Members of the House of Representatives to pay, from the Official Expenses Allowance, the actual cost of extraneous matter printed in that portion of the Congressional Record entitled "Extensions of Remarks".

summary.text: Requires Members of the House of Representatives to pay from their Official Expenses Allowance the actual cost of extraneous matter printed in the "Extensions of Remarks" section of the Congressional Record.

titles.title: Requiring Members of the House of Representatives to pay, from the Official Expenses Allowance, the actual cost of extraneous matter printed in that portion of the Congressional Record entitled "Extensions of Remarks".
